snippet.title: Sparky: Hills of Death - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
In the game “Sparky: Hills of Death” recently developed by Hito Corporation, players are immersed in a dark universe designed by Sam Wills. The protagonist Sparky, comes to life in a sinister way transcending the boundaries between reality and the game.

Zac a virtual security expert, finds himself immersed in this nightmare, while Marina his girlfriend, observes peculiar events in the real world related to the game.

The distinction between the virtual and the real disappears, leading players to a startling experience in which they must unravel enigmas, confront their fears and uncover the mysteries hidden in the Hills of Death. The horror tangibly materializes in 2024.

Control the Character with the WASD keys on your keyboard and using the Mouse to move the camera, you must escape the location while there are enemies behind you, as the game progresses, look for items to survive, such as flashlights with batteries, places to stay hidden and much more!

#Sparky #Sparkyhillsofdeath #MascotHorror

Sparky: Hills of Death - Release Date Trailer
